Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClerk.findBusiness(String)
    Use getBusinessDetail instead
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClerk.findBusiness(String, Node)
    Use getBusinessDetail instead
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClerk.findService(String)
    see getServiceDetail
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClerk.findService(String, Node)
    see getServiceDetail
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClerk.findServiceBinding(String)
    see getServiceBindingDetail
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClerk.findServiceBinding(String, Node)
    use getServiceBindingDetail instead
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.ClientConfig.getClientCallbackUrl()
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClient.getClientCallbackUrl()
    use SubscriptionCallbackListener
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClerk.getServices() 
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClient.getTransport()
    use the getTransport(String nodeName) instead. Returns the "default" jUDDI nodes Transport. Note: this will always return a new instance of Transport
    org.apache.juddi.v3.client.config.UDDIClerk.setServices(Map<String, Properties>)
